value.string:
portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 remove_hosting_list = []
 add_kw_list = []
 start_date_tuple_list = []
 
 def getWorkflowDate(document, action):
 workflow_item_list = portal.portal_workflow.getInfoFor(
 ob=document,
 name='history',
 wf_id='instance_slap_interface_workflow')
 for item in workflow_item_list:
 if item.get('action') == action:
 return item.get('time')
 raise ValueError('Document %s has no action %s' % (document.getPath(),
 action))
 
 for hosting_subscription in portal.portal_catalog(
 portal_type='Hosting Subscription',
 default_destination_section_uid=context.getUid(),
 ):
 hosting_subscription = hosting_subscription.getObject()
 add_kw = dict(
 title=hosting_subscription.getTitle(),
 aggregate=hosting_subscription.getRelativeUrl()
 )
 add_kw_list.append((add_kw, hosting_subscription.getPath()))
 if hosting_subscription.getSlapState() == 'destroy_requested':
 remove_hosting_list.append((hosting_subscription.getRelativeUrl(),
 hosting_subscription.getPath()))
 try:
 start_date = getWorkflowDate(hosting_subscription, 'request_instance')
 except ValueError:
 start_date = hosting_subscription.getCreationDate()
 start_date_tuple_list.append((hosting_subscription.getRelativeUrl(),
 start_date,
 hosting_subscription.getPath()))
 
 
 result = context.Person_updateOpenSaleOrder(
 src__=src__,
 remove_hosting_list=remove_hosting_list,
 add_kw_list=add_kw_list,
 start_date_tuple_list=start_date_tuple_list,
 stop_date=stop_date)
 from pprint import pformat
 return pformat(result)
